front.title: IPsec Security Policy IPsec Action MIB

abstract.t: This document defines an SMIv2 Management Information Base (MIB) module for configuring IPsec actions for the security policy database (SPD) of a device that uses the IPsec Security Policy Database Configuration MIB for configuring the IPSec protocol actions on that device. The IPsec Action MIB integrates directly with the IPsec Security Policy Database Configuration MIB and it is meant to work within the framework of an action referenced by that MIB.
